participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Alex enjoys spending quality time with family and values hard work.
participant_1.background: Soccer is my favorite sport, but playing it in the cold weather can be rough. I used to be a meat eater but I'm now a vegan. I wake up early, spend time with my family, and work hard to provide for them. My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career. I love to recycle.

participant_2.name: Jenna
participant_2.personality: Joyful and affectionate, Jenna values her relationships and enjoys the little things in life.
participant_2.background: I made sure to take my dog on a walk every day while I was on vacation. I'm happily married to the love of my life. I have been married for five years. I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar. I've a younger sibling.

content.text: It's going great! I just got back from vacation and I'm happy to be home.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time. What'd you do on vacation?
I went to the beach and spent a lot of time with my dog.
That sounds amazing! I love the beach.
Me too! It's my favorite place to be.
I have a dog and a cat.
That's awesome! I have two dogs.
That's great! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a poodle.
Oh my gosh, those are my two favorite breeds!
